data.text:
@SenHawleyPress @BretBaier @SpecialReport Request from many Iranians to the international community:

1. To recognize a transitional government led by Reza Pahlavi.
2. To transfer the representation of Iranian embassies to this transitional leadership.

#KingRezaPahlavi
#MeetOurKing
#IranMassacre
@SenHawleyPress @BretBaier @SpecialReport Never regarding the enemy as a friend!

@SenHawleyPress @BretBaier @SpecialReport Senator Hawley, the Iranian people are risking everything for freedom and human rights. Your support can amplify their fight against the Islamic Republic’s repression. Thank you—on behalf of Iranians— please make your voice more heard in this matter.
@SenHawleyPress @BretBaier @SpecialReport More BS for the goyim huh
@SenHawleyPress @BretBaier @SpecialReport @SenHawleyPress this person is CCP, connected to the one that was busted a couple years ago in Cali. You know the CCP is our enemy and you lick their boots
